content:
Hi all,
I'm trying to validate my company's FHIR implementation using the provided schematrons on hl7.org.
The schematron for the parameters resource is broken, braces are mismatched: http://hl7.org/fhir/parameters.sch
This schematron is also missing from the DSTU3 release, I would expect to find it at http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/parameters.sch

I have raised an issue with the validator I am using (hapi-fhir) however the schematron should also be fixed on hl7.org please.
Can you please submit a change request using the "propose a change" link at the bottom of any page in the spec?
